title: windows好用工具
content:
windows好用工具
===
## `software`

- [Chocolatey Gallery | Ditto Clipboard 3.22.53.0-beta](https://chocolatey.org/packages/ditto)
  - 软件管理工具
- [Ditto clipboard manager](https://ditto-cp.sourceforge.io/]
  - 剪切板db
- [GitHub - Wox-launcher/Wox: Launcher for Windows, an alternative to Alfred and Launchy.](https://github.com/Wox-launcher/Wox)
  - 效率启动器，类似mac的 alfred
  - 可代替`Everything`
- [Listary – File Search & App Launcher](https://www.listary.com/)
- [Seer](http://1218.io/)
  - 文件预览
  - [Seer download | SourceForge.net | 免费版](https://sourceforge.net/projects/ccseer/?source=typ_redirect)
- [Boostnote | Boost Happiness, Productivity, and Creativity.](https://boostnote.io/)
  - `Markdown editor` 
  - 笔记整理


## `chrome`插件
- json viewer
- one tab
- Tampermonkey BETA
- The Great Suspender
- Vimium
- Octotree
